# typeIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The uniform type identifier for the data asset.

## Declaration

```swift
var typeIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

A uniform type identifier is a string for identifying the type of data. This UTI is the same as the one specified in the asset catalog. For more information, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/FileManagement/Conceptual/understanding_utis/understand_utis_intro/understand_utis_intro.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40001319].

## Getting data asset information

- **name**: The name of the data set in the asset catalog.
- **NSDataAsset.Name**: The name of a data asset.
